DOC.brief_summary: A group orthopedic physiotherapist develop late phase program educate instruct total hip replacement patient progressive exercise appropriate level recovery . The component program include educational presentation , individual assessment exercise prescription . The investigator ' intent pilot program use sample patient . The objective pilot project : To examine effect late phase education session home-based exercise program restore hip muscle strength , gait function
DOC.brief_title: Effects Late Phase Exercise Program Following Total Hip Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: unilateral primary total hip arthroplasty ( THA ) 812 week post THA age 18 able walk 15m without walk aid able participate exercise program without physical assistance available follow per study protocol able read understand English follow verbal visual instruction medically unstable central peripheral nervous system deficit underlie terminal disease ( cancer ) suspicion infection follow joint replacement
